snippet.title: Lost and Hound Trailer
snippet.description:
Lost and Hound is an investigative adventure game where you play as a scent tracking dog, finding yourself in situations in which you're the only one for miles that can find and save people who are lost. It tells the story of Hayden, whose life is being revealed through phone voicemails to be falling apart. As you help find people's lost loved ones, you find yourself a family, a home, and help your own find a way back to himself.
Wishlist now! Coming August 17th on Steam! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1054350/Lost_and_Hound/
